rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04}

description: This unit aims to provide a detailed exploration on the workings of the media industry in Southeast Asia. It contextualizes the key theoretical frameworks and media issues within the region in order to obtain a deeper understanding into the current state of media and reporting in Southeast Asian countries. It aims to provide a historical context to develop an awareness of the politics of colonization and decolonization to understand its relevance to media and reporting in the region.
